ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Goodies from Greenies
ygData.msgSnippet: IIRC, my sister told me that the trivial loot crap didn t go over well and that it screwed some people from being able to do their epics so they stopped it. So
ygData.messageBody:
IIRC, my sister told me that the trivial loot crap didn't go over well and
that it screwed some people from being able to do their epics so they
stopped it. So as far as I know, even greenies still drop the rare loot.
luv,
-Su

> I have been researching some items I can hunt while foraging some
> things needed for my epic, should I ever go for that pinacle.
>
> Some things I wish to hunt are dropped by greenies. I was just
> wondering if the rare drops still drop from greenies, or if the rumor
> is true that, if you don't get experience you can't get a rare drop.
>
> Anyone know the status of the rules on this subject?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
> Zeb server
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
